attributes.action: in 2008, when Easter falls the weekend before British Summer Time begins, bring forward the start of BST to Easter weekend.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Next year, Easter Sunday falls on March 23rd. The clocks are not due to go forward until the following weekend. In view of this situation it seems sensible to bring the start of BST to Easter weekend to allow people to enjoy the Easter weekend evenings. (There are a variety of views about when BST should start, or whether it should run year-round. This is merely intended to deal with the situation which, almost without precedent and with no recurrence due for many years, occurs in 2008.)
